message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $9,500? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet in the middle at $9,250? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on this price.
